battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau opens with a lightning-fast combo, testing Bruce Lee's legendary reflexes in round one. Can the Dragon withstand this early onslaught.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Moreau's lightning-fast reflexes are already on full display in round one as he expertly sidesteps a flurry of Bruce Lee's iconic strikes, showcasing precise defensive mastery.
battleLog.randomEvent: Victor Moreau narrowly dodges Bruce Lee's attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau narrowly avoids a devastating counter from Bruce Lee's lightning-fast reflexes! A calculated strike lands for 22 damage, but Victor remains dangerous in this heated Round 2.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Moreau's on high alert in this round two clash!  He expertly reads Bruce Lee's lightning-fast combo attempts and weaves through each one with calculated precision.
battleLog.randomEvent: Bruce Lee uses undefined to enhance their attack!
